00057 
00058 template<typename FFTFloat>
00059 class FFTProcessor : public processor::base_iq {
00060 public:
00061   // typedef float FFTFloat;
00062   typedef std::complex<double> complex_type;
00063   typedef std::vector<complex_type> Samples;
00064 
00065 #ifdef USE_CUDA
00066   typedef FFT::CUFFTTransform fft_type;
00067 #else
00068   typedef typename FFT::FFTWTransform<FFTFloat> fft_type;
00069 #endif
00070 
00071   typedef std::string LevelKey;
00072   typedef class ActionKey {
00073   public:
00074     ActionKey(std::string name, size_t number) : name_(name), number_(number) {}
00075     std::string name() const { return name_; }
00076     size_t number() const { return number_; }
00077     friend std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const ActionKey& a) {
00078       return os << "(" << a.name() << ", " << a.number() << ")";
00079     }
00080     friend bool operator<(const ActionKey& a1, const ActionKey& a2) {
00081       return a1.makePair() < a2.makePair();
00082     }
00083     std::string toString() const { return name_ + str(boost::format("_%04d")  % number_); }
00084     std::pair<std::string, size_t> makePair() const { return std::make_pair(name_, number_); }
00085   private:
00086     std::string name_;
00087     size_t number_;
00088   } ActionKey;
00089   typedef std::map<ActionKey, Action::Handle> ActionMap;
00090   typedef std::map<LevelKey, ActionMap> LevelMap;
00091 
00092   typedef std::string ResultKey;
00093   typedef std::map<ResultKey, Result::Base::Handle> ResultMap;
00094 
00095   class FFTProxy : public Proxy::Base {
00096   public:
00097     FFTProxy(::processor::service_iq::sptr sp, std::string level, ResultMap& resultMap)
00098       : ptime_(sp->approx_ptime())
00099       , level_(level)
00100       , resultMap_(resultMap) {}
00101 
00102     virtual void putResult(std::string resultKey, Result::Base::Handle result) {
00103       // LOG_INFO_T(approxPTime_, str(boost::format("FFTProxy::result [%s] =  %s") % resultKey % result));
00104       std::string key(level() + "." + resultKey);      
00105       if (resultMap_.find(key) != resultMap_.end())
00106         LOG_WARNING_T(ptime_, str(boost::format("overwriting key %s") % key));
00107       result->set_name(key);
00108       resultMap_[key] = result;
00109     }
00110 
00111     virtual Result::Base::Handle getResult(std::string keyString) const {
00112       ResultMap::const_iterator i(resultMap_.find(keyString));
00113       ASSERT_THROW(i != resultMap_.end());
00114       return i->second;
00115     }
00116     virtual ptime getApproxPTime() const { return ptime_; }
00117     virtual double volt2dbm(double v) const {
00118       // P = U*U/R, R=50 Ohm, relative to 1mW
00119       return 10.*std::log10(0.5*v*v/50.) + 30.; // - 3.*header_.adcPreamp() + 10.*header_.attenId();
00120     }
00121     virtual double rms_dbm() const {
00122       return volt2dbm(1.0/static_cast<double>(1L << 24));
00123     }
00124   private:
00125     std::string level() const { return level_; }
00126     const ::processor::service_base::ptime ptime_;
00127     const std::string level_;
00128     ResultMap& resultMap_;
00129   } ;
00130  
00131   FFTProcessor(const boost::property_tree::ptree& config)
00132     : base_iq(config)
00133     , fftw_(1024, FFTW_BACKWARD, FFTW_ESTIMATE)
00134     , windowFcnName_(config.get<std::string>("<xmlattr>.windowFunction"))
00135     , calibrationKey_(config.get<std::string>("Actions.<xmlattr>.calibrationKey"))
00136     , modCounter_(std::max(1u, config.get<unsigned>("<xmlattr>.numberOfCollectedEpochs"))) {
00137     using boost::property_tree::ptree;
00138     // Levels
00139     BOOST_FOREACH(const ptree::value_type& level, config.get_child("Actions")) {
00140       if (level.first.size() == 0 || level.first[0] == '<') continue;
00141       LOG_INFO(str(boost::format("Level: %s") % level.first));
00142       // Actions
00143       size_t counter(0);
00144       BOOST_FOREACH(const ptree::value_type& action, level.second) {
00145         const ActionKey actionKey(action.first, counter++);
00146         LOG_INFO(str(boost::format(" +--- Action: %s") % actionKey));
00147         actions_[level.first][actionKey] = Action::Factory::makeAction(actionKey.name(), action.second);
00148       }
00149     }
00150   }
00151   virtual ~FFTProcessor() {}
00152 
00153   static sptr make(const boost::property_tree::ptree& config) {
00154     sptr result(new FFTProcessor<FFTFloat>(config));
00155     return result;
00156   }
00157 
00158   virtual void process_iq(service::sptr sp,
00159                           const_iterator i0,
00160                           const_iterator i1) {
00161     const size_t length(std::distance(i0, i1));
00162     if (length != fftw_.size()) fftw_.resize(length);
00163     LOG_INFO_T(sp->approx_ptime(), str(boost::format("FFTProcessor::procIQ %s") % sp->id()));
00164     if (windowFcnName_ == "Rectangular")
00165       fftw_.transformRange(i0, i1, FFT::WindowFunction::Rectangular<complex_type::value_type>(length));
00166     else if (windowFcnName_ == "Hanning")
00167       fftw_.transformRange(i0, i1, FFT::WindowFunction::Hanning<complex_type::value_type>(length));
00168     else if (windowFcnName_ == "Hamming")
00169       fftw_.transformRange(i0, i1, FFT::WindowFunction::Hamming<complex_type::value_type>(length));
00170     else if (windowFcnName_ == "Blackman")
00171       fftw_.transformRange(i0, i1, FFT::WindowFunction::Blackman<complex_type::value_type>(length));
00172     else 
00173       throw std::runtime_error(THROW_SITE_INFO(windowFcnName_ + ": unknown window function"));
00174     
00175     const FFTSpectrum<fft_type> s(fftw_, sp->sample_rate_Hz(), sp->center_frequency_Hz());
00176   
00177     // operate on Spectrum
00178     ResultMap resultMap;
00179     // set default calibration from the last epoch
00180     // it will be overwritten with the new calibration
00181     if (calibrationHandle_ != 0)
00182       resultMap[calibrationKey_] = calibrationHandle_;
00183     else
00184       resultMap[calibrationKey_] = Result::Calibration::makeDefault(sp->approx_ptime(), calibrationKey_);
00185       
00186     BOOST_FOREACH(const typename LevelMap::value_type& level, actions_) {
00187       BOOST_FOREACH(const typename ActionMap::value_type& action, level.second) {
00188         FFTProxy proxy(sp, level.first, resultMap);
00189         // LOG_INFO(str(boost::format("%s %s") % level.first % action.first));
00190         action.second->perform(proxy, s);
00191       }
00192     }
00193 
00194     ++modCounter_;
00195 
00196     // collect results
00197     BOOST_FOREACH(const ResultMap::value_type& result, resultMap) {
00198       sp->put_result(result.second);
00199       ResultMap::iterator i(resultBuffer_.find(result.first));
00200       if (i != resultBuffer_.end())
00201         i->second->push_back(result.second);
00202       else
00203         resultBuffer_[result.first] = result.second;
00204     }
00205     
00206     // output results
00207     if (modCounter_ == 0) {
00208       BOOST_FOREACH(const ResultMap::value_type& result, resultBuffer_) {
00209         dump(result);
00210         result.second->clear();
00211       }
00212       resultBuffer_.clear();
00213     }
00214 
00215     // check if calibration has succeded
00216     // store (a copy of) the cal handle with "worst-case" covariance for use in the next epoch
00217     const ResultMap::iterator i(resultMap.find(calibrationKey_));
00218     if (i != resultMap.end()) {
00219       Result::Calibration::Handle
00220         ch(boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<Result::Calibration>(i->second));
00221       if (ch != 0)
00222         calibrationHandle_= ch->withWorstCaseCov(calibrationKey_);
00223       else
00224         LOG_WARNING_T(sp->approx_ptime(),
00225                       str(boost::format("resultMap[%s] is not of type Result::Calibration::Handle")
00226                           % calibrationKey_));
00227     }
00228   }
00229 
00230 protected:
00231   virtual void dump(const ResultMap::value_type& result) {
00232     // to be overwritten in a derived class
00233   }
00234 
00235 private:
00236   fft_type    fftw_;
00237   std::string windowFcnName_;
00238   std::string calibrationKey_;
00239   Internal::ModuloCounter<size_t> modCounter_;
00240   Result::Base::Handle            calibrationHandle_;
00241   LevelMap  actions_;
00242   ResultMap resultBuffer_;
00243 } ;
00246 #endif // _FFT_PROCESSOR_HPP_cm100729_
